description: Signals that the primary text command input element should be disabled, preventing the user from typing commands. The payload includes a message that should typically be displayed as the input field's placeholder text while disabled.

message.description: The message to display in the input field's placeholder attribute when it is disabled (e.g., 'Input disabled.', 'Processing...', 'Fatal error during initialization. Cannot continue.').

payloadSchema.$comment: Used by InputStateController to update the placeholder and disable the input. Also used by InputHandler to stop processing Enter key.
